AutoVariable.label: Enable auto item
AutoVariable.tooltip: Allows you to automatically rent and craft items, very useful for bots.

AutoVariable.label: Check interval
AutoVariable.tooltip: Time between auto item attempts in milliseconds.

AutoVariable.label: Enable auto metal
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically craft metal from unused weapons

AutoVariable.label: Auto combine metal
AutoVariable.tooltip: Automatically combine scrap into reclaimed and reclaimed into refined

AutoVariable.label: Min weapons to craft
AutoVariable.tooltip: Minimum number of weapons needed to start crafting metal

AutoVariable.label: Keep Strange items
AutoVariable.tooltip: Don't craft Strange quality items into metal

AutoVariable.label: Keep Vintage items
AutoVariable.tooltip: Don't craft Vintage quality items into metal

AutoVariable.label: Keep Genuine items
AutoVariable.tooltip: Don't craft Genuine quality items into metal

AutoVariable.label: Item blacklist
AutoVariable.tooltip: Comma-separated list of item IDs to never craft into metal

AutoVariable.label: Primary
AutoVariable.tooltip: Primary weapon to rent/craft, see cathook.club/wiki/How-to-Autoitem for formatting information. -1 is stock.

AutoVariable.label: Secondary/Cloak
AutoVariable.tooltip: Secondary/Cloak weapon to rent/craft, see cathook.club/wiki/How-to-Autoitem for formatting information. -1 is stock.

AutoVariable.label: Melee
AutoVariable.tooltip: Melee weapon to rent/craft, see cathook.club/wiki/How-to-Autoitem for formatting information. -1 is stock.

AutoVariable.label: Hats
AutoVariable.tooltip: Enable automatically equipping hats, if it's an achievement hat it will be automatically obtained, else you must have the item already.

AutoVariable.label: Hat 1
AutoVariable.tooltip: First hat/cosmetic to equip, see cathook.club/wiki/How-to-Autoitem

AutoVariable.label: Hat 2
AutoVariable.tooltip: Second hat/cosmetic to equip, see cathook.club/wiki/How-to-Autoitem

AutoVariable.label: Hat 3
AutoVariable.tooltip: Third hat/cosmetic to equip, see cathook.club/wiki/How-to-Autoitem
